vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.41
§ Elah = "An oak"
1) an Edomite chief
2) a king of Israel for two years, son of Baasha
3) the father of king Hoshea of Israel
4) a son of Caleb
5) son of Uzzi
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (2a)   jefe de Edom; (2b)   hijo de Baasá; rey de Israel (886/85-885/84); (2c)   padre de Oseas, rey de Israel; (2d)   hijo de Caleb; tribu de Judá; (2e)   hijo de Uzí; tribu de Benjamín; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以拉 这个陽性專有名詞 地名在原文的意思是 "橡樹"
1) 以東的族長 (創 36:41; 代上 1:52)
2) 以色列王, 在位兩年, 是巴沙的兒子
3) 以色列王何細亞的父親
4) 迦勒的兒子 (代上 4:15)
5) 烏西的兒子 (代上 9:8)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以拉 这个阳性专有名词 地名在原文的意思是 "橡树"
1) 以东的族长 (创 36:41; 代上 1:52)
2) 以色列王, 在位两年, 是巴沙的儿子
3) 以色列王何细亚的父亲
4) 迦勒的儿子 (代上 4:15)
5) 乌西的儿子 (代上 9:8)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A king living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ki.16.6;
son of: Baasha (H1201)
§ Elah = "An oak"
1) an Edomite chief
2) a king of Israel for two years, son of Baasha
3) the father of king Hoshea of Israel
4) a son of Caleb
5) son of Uzzi

A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.15.30;
father of: Hoshea (H1954)
§ Elah = "An oak"
1) an Edomite chief
2) a king of Israel for two years, son of Baasha
3) the father of king Hoshea of Israel
4) a son of Caleb
5) son of Uzzi

A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.4.15;
son of: Caleb (H3612);
brother of: Achsah (H5915), Iru (H5900) and Naam (H5277);
father of: Kenaz (H7073J)
§ Elah = "An oak"
1) an Edomite chief
2) a king of Israel for two years, son of Baasha
3) the father of king Hoshea of Israel
4) a son of Caleb
5) son of Uzzi

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at 1Ch.9.8;
son of: Uzzi (H5813J)
§ Elah = "An oak"
1) an Edomite chief
2) a king of Israel for two years, son of Baasha
3) the father of king Hoshea of Israel
4) a son of Caleb
5) son of Uzzi

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Combined with e.meq (עֵ֫מֶק " Valley" H6010I)
§ Elah = "An oak"
This name is used for:
1) an Edomite chief
2) a king of Israel for two years, son of Baasha
3) the father of king Hoshea of Israel
4) a son of Caleb
5) son of Uzzi
